title: How much profit does the Hillsong Church make? - Quora

response.answer_text: As a non-profit, they do not generate a profit that goes to any share holders. The structure of the non-profit dictates that any money generated stays within the organisation, gets used for charitable goals or to run day-to-day services (church maintenance, electricity). This doesn’t mean people don’t get paid, pastors are on modest salarys. It just means there are no profits made and kept.

You can see the high level financials in their annual reports, e.g. as of the time of writing the latest report containing financial information is the 2016 report (the info for the 2017 report is not due ‘til June 30 2018): 2017 Annual Report Australia It was reported that the church took $130 million in revenue. Obviously they don't break it down to the level of individual wages, etc.
